Superman - With superhuman strength, speed, and the ability to fly, Superman is an iconic character known for his unwavering dedication to truth, justice, and the American way. I would choose Superman because he embodies the qualities of courage, compassion, and selflessness that I aspire to. Plus, who wouldn't want to have superpowers? (Confidence score: 0.9)

The Doctor - As a time-traveling alien from the planet Gallifrey, the Doctor is a brilliant and eccentric being with the ability to regenerate and live for centuries. I would choose the Doctor because of his boundless curiosity, unwavering sense of justice, and his unshakeable belief in the power of kindness and compassion. Plus, traveling through time and exploring new worlds would be an incredible adventure. (Confidence score: 0.8)

Harry Potter - As a young wizard with a scar on his forehead and a lightning-shaped scar, Harry Potter is a relatable and inspiring character known for his bravery, loyalty, and unwavering commitment to fighting evil. I would choose Harry Potter because he embodies the qualities of resilience, compassion, and determination that I strive to embody in my own life. Plus, having the ability to cast spells and fly on broomsticks would be incredible! (Confidence score: 0.9)

Katniss Everdeen - As the fearless and determined leader of the rebellion in Panem, Katniss Everdeen is a strong and inspiring character known for her bravery, selflessness, and unwavering commitment to fighting for what is right. I would choose Katniss because she embodies the qualities of courage, compassion, and leadership that I admire and aspire to. Plus, living in a dystopian society with a bow and arrow would be an incredible adventure. (Confidence score: 0.8)
